title: Football starts here! Falcons @ Saints on 10/15 #TNF
text:
Football starts here! Falcons @ Saints on 10/15 #TNF WASHINGTON (WUSA9) -- #TNF on WUSA9! Heated rivalry in the NFC South as Atlanta takes on New Orleans. Post to Facebook Football starts here! Falcons @ Saints on 10/15 #TNF WASHINGTON (WUSA9) -- #TNF on WUSA9! Heated rivalry in the NFC South as Atlanta takes on New Orleans.  //on.wusa9.com/1LvTxpb   Join the Conversation To   Football starts here! Falcons @ Saints on 10/15 #TNF WUSA 12:57 p.m. EDT October 15, 2015 Thursday Night Football. CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
WASHINGTON (WUSA9) -- #TNF on WUSA9! 
Heated rivalry in the NFC South as Atlanta takes on New Orleans at The Mercedes-Benz Superdome. 
Game will kick-off at approximately 8:26 p.m. on October 15. 
The Falcons fight to remain undefeated and New Orleans hopes to improve their record in the win column. Currently 1-4. 
Atlanta's rush attack remains strong and The Saints defense is struggling. 
When these 2 teams meet - anything can happen! Who will win? Tune in to find out! 
For coverage leading up to the game, watch WUSA9 News at 5 p.m., 6 p.m. and 7 p.m. 
NFL Thursday Night Kick-off Pre-Game Show airs at 7:30 p.m. 
After the game, WUSA9 News is scheduled at 11:15 p.m. and The Late Show With Stephen Colbert at 11:50 p.m. Times will slide if football overrun. 
Football starts here!
